sentences.sentence: And some lucky attendee will win an iPhone.
As one attendee summed up, "Where have we come from?"
sentences.translation: 就像一位与会者总结的，“我们从哪里来？”

sentences.sentence: "All of us together, in that beautiful place," one attendee recalls.
sentences.translation: “我们聚在在那个美丽的地方，”一位出席聚会的员工回忆。
